TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ConstructionEnabledAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Enables COM+ object construction support. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks For a list of initial property values for an instance of ConstructionEnabledAttribute, see the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ConstructionEnabledAttribute.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](../Topic/Extending%20Metadata%20Using%20Attributes.md).
## Examples The following code example demonstrates the use of this attribute to associate an object constructor string with a <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServicedComponent> class.
[!code-cpp[EnterpriseServices_Security#4](~/add/codesnippet/CPP/t-system.enterpriseservi_31_1.cpp)] [!code-cs[EnterpriseServices_Security#4](~/add/codesnippet/CSharp/t-system.enterpriseservi_31_1.cs)] [!code-vb[EnterpriseServices_Security#4](~/add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/t-system.enterpriseservi_31_1.vb)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class and initializes the default settings for <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ConstructionEnabledAttribute.Enabled%2A> and <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ConstructionEnabledAttribute.Default%2A>.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ConstructionEnabledAttribute>.
|Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |`Default`|An empty string ("")| |`Enabled`|`true`|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(bool val) cil managed

Docs.param: to enable COM+ object construction support; otherwise, .
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, setting <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ConstructionEnabledAttribute.Enabled%2A> to the specified value.
Gets or sets a default value for the constructor string.
Docs.value: The value to be used for the default constructor string. The default is an empty string ("").

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether COM+ object construction support is enabled.
Docs.value: if COM+ object construction support is enabled; otherwise, . The default is .
